description: Embrace fresh powder days in these ergonomic-fit snow pants made with thermal-reflective lining and synthetic insulation.  Critically seam-sealed to keep water out, these pants feature Omni-Tech™ technology to keep you dry and well ventilated.  A snap gusset, reinforced hem, and internal leg gaiters keep powder where it belongs. Zip-up pockets keep small items secure.
name: Bugaboo Omni-Heat Pants, Short - Womens
